    • Constructor Detail

      • Brackets

        public Brackets()
        Constructor create one pair of bracket sequence.

      • Brackets

        public Brackets(int numberOfPairs)
        Constructor create bracket sequence with specified number of pairs. If pairs are more than ten, system automation change pairs number on 7.
        Parameters:
        numberOfPairs - number of pairs.

    • Method Detail

      • solution

        public void solution()
        Solution of task #1 which must be solved. Create bracket sequence with user input number of pairs. If input data not a number, system automation give additional try while input data is not number
